summary: Adds Daedric armor to the player-exclusive WereSkeever model from gg77's mod.
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to roleplay as the infamous Proffessor Ratigan from [i]The Great Mouse Detective[/i]? Now you can! This mod replaces the WereSkeever model provided by gg77 as a player-exclusive Werewolf replacer. I simply added the armor parts from the well known Werewolf Lord Armor by Loshirai14.

Required mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61545/?]WereSkeever Replacer Player Only[/url] and it's requirements.

Upon extracting the file, click yes to overwrite.

Credits:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4899950]gg77[/url] for the werewolf replacer.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4958627]Loshirai14[/url] for the armor parts.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/336241]lifestorock[/url] for the WereSkeever model from their Skyrim Immersive Creatures mod.
author: T3alrose Loshirai14 lifestorock gg77
